Another consultation.

“How can I appease Kjorikos?” You ask.

“He is too far lost. What he feels for the one he loves has become sick, and twisted.” The fortune-teller says. “But Velika can yet be saved. The weight you feel upon you now is of his jealous rage, and of her anguished spirit. You could enter his sanctum, and find a way to free her. Though, I cannot advise with certainty what course you should follow, but to remain inactive in the days to come having roused him to action could lead to a terrible fate.”

You turn on a heel and leave. You're starting to feel crazy.
